description: Tofu takes on lots of flavour with a quick marinade, making it the perfect filling for this tasty vegan banh mi.
name: Tofu Banh Mi Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the tofu in a shallow dish and pour over the soy, half of the lime juice, half of the sesame oil, half of the sriracha and add the garlic. Flip the tofu strips to coat with marinade and set aside for 20 minutes.
Toss the cucumber and carrot in lime juice in a large bowl and set aside for 15-20 minutes.
Heat the remaining oil in a large non-stick pan and fry the tofu for 2 minutes on each side, until crisp and lightly golden. Whisk the remaining marinade with the mayonnaise in a small bowl.
Cut each baguette in half and slice open lengthways. Spread with mayonnaise, add sliced tofu, top with quick pickled vegetables and serve.
